name.str_pl: issues of Guns n Ammo

description: Reviews of firearms, and various useful tips about their use.

name.str_pl: issues of Guns n Ammo

variants.description: Reviews of firearms, and various useful tips about their use.

name.str_pl: issues of Gun Digest

variants.description: Annual issue about firearms, weapon collections, self-defense, same as some practical and legal advices..

name.str_pl: issues of Recoil

variants.description: Fresh issue about handguns, tactical weapon, knives and shooting activities.  It says there is a fold-out target, but someone took it off.

name.str_pl: issues of SWAT

variants.description: "Special Weapons And Tactics for the prepared American", this magazine contain info about firearms, law enforcement and activity around it, with a focus on SWAT police officers.

name.str_pl: issues of Bullet Point

variants.description: Small magazine about firearm and ammo, and how to choose, use and maintain them properly.

name.str_pl: issues of Trigger Happy

variants.description: Modern journal for young people, about firearms, self-defense, different competitions and reviews.

name.str_pl: copies of The Gun Owner's Handbook

description: A thick soft-cover book that claims to be a complete guide to safely operating, maintaining, and repairing firearms.

name.str_pl: copies of The Gun Owner's Handbook

variants.description: A thick soft-cover book that claims to be a complete guide to safely operating, maintaining, and repairing firearms.

name.str_pl: copies of FM 3-90-1: Offense And Defense

variants.description: Official U.S. Army manual about basics and tactics of moving and attacking the target - how to shoot, how to hide, how to retreat, and how to defend.

name.str_pl: issues of Surplus Military

variants.description: The journal about modern and old firearms, their style, manufacturing and usage.

name.str_pl: copies of Owning a Modern Firearm

variants.description: Essential handbook on requirement to own, use and properly maintain a modernday firearm.

name.str_pl: copies of Practical Shooting Training

variants.description: Step-by-step instruction of how to use a gun, with lot of drills and trainings for each level.

name.str_pl: copies of The Illustrated History of Firearms

variants.description: Reference book, that contain hundreds of firearms images inside, with lot of professional's comments and information about each model.

name.str_pl: copies of Long Range Shooting Handbook

variants.description: "The Complete Beginner's Guide to Precision Rifle Shooting", the book contain information about shooting equipment, terminology, principles, cover the theory of long range shooting, and has a lot practical advices about marksmanship.

name.str_pl: copies of The Rifle-Musket

variants.description: "A Practical Treatise on the Enfield-Pritchett Rifle, Recently Adopted in the British Service", this is a practical guide about using of newly adopted P-1853 Enfield Rifle-Musket.  Despite being written in 1854, it still has lot of useful information about shooting, same as information about work and maintenance this antique rifle.

name.str_pl: copies of Pocket Guide to Firearm Safety

description: This pocket-sized leather-bound guide to firearm safety combines a wealth of concise information with simple to follow instructions and easy to read illustrations.

name.str_pl: copies of Ballistics: Theory, Design, and Application

description: This hefty, hardbound textbook is written in obtuse, complex language.  If you already knew a bit about engineering and fabrication, it might be a useful reference on gunsmithing and design, but without that knowledge it'd be better used to prop up a table.

name.str_pl: copies of Ballistics: Theory, Design, and Application

variants.description: This hefty, hardbound textbook is written in obtuse, complex language.  If you already knew a bit about engineering and fabrication, it might be a useful reference on gunsmithing and design, but without that knowledge it'd be better used to prop up a table.

name.str_pl: copies of The Complete Guide to Gunsmithing

variants.description: Pretty old, this book is a highly detailed and essential reference for the gun enthusiast, and covers the use of proper tools to how to get a gunsmithing job, and everything in between.

name.str_pl: copies of Professional Gunsmithing

variants.description: Guide for gunshop owners, this book contain lot of information about weapon and equipment maintenance.

name.str_pl: copies of Gunsmithing - Rifles

variants.description: The book contains step-by-step instructions to repair and maintain to all major rifle types, from AR-15 and AK-47 to M1 Garand, same as accurizing projects and different enhancements.

name.str: Gunsmithing: A Manual of Firearm Design, Construction, Alteration and Remodeling
name.str_pl: copies of Gunsmithing: A Manual of Firearm Design, Construction, Alteration and Remodeling

variants.description: This book contain extremely precise instructions of how to fix different issues with gun.  Lot of modern photos is a huge advantage, but the fact it's a reprint of 1950s book is not.

name.str: The Guns of John Moses Browning
name.str_pl: copies of The Guns of John Moses Browning

variants.description: Major biography of John Moses Browning, "the Thomas Edison of guns", this book describe his story, and the invention he make - decisions behind their development, processes, manufacturing and usage.

name.str: DIY Guns: Easy DIY Gunsmithing Projects
name.str_pl: issues of DIY Guns: Easy DIY Gunsmithing Projects

variants.description: Big magazine about different gunsmith projects: from tuning your gun to making a brand new one using common details.

name.str_pl: copies of The Book of the Crossbow

variants.description: The book detail the long story of crossbows - a devastating weapon, improved the medieval distance warfare drastically - with lot of illustrations and information about additional weapons, like ballistae and catapults.
